sect1.title: Getting the Most Out of Volunteers
sect1.para: How to get the most out of volunteers. When to do something yourself, when to ask someone else.

sect1.title: Share Management Tasks As Well As Technical Tasks
sect1.screen:
Letting volunteers share the management burden as well as the technical burden:
- patch management - bug management - release management - documentation and FAQ maintenance - distributing meta-management tasks.

sect1.title: The Right Person For the Right Job
sect1.para: When and how to ask someone to step aside from a role for which they're not suited.
